items.name: Affogato
items.description: A shot of hot espresso poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream, blending the richness of both for a decadent dessert-drink experience.

items.name: Hazelnut Cappuccino
items.description: A classic cappuccino infused with the sweet, nutty flavor of hazelnut, topped with frothy milk.

items.name: Caramel Cappuccino
items.description: A delicious twist on the cappuccino, sweetened with rich caramel syrup and finished with creamy foam.

items.name: Vanilla Cappuccino
items.description: The warm flavors of vanilla elevate this cappuccino, offering a smooth and comforting taste.

items.name: Hazelnut Latte
items.description: A smooth latte infused with hazelnut flavor, topped with frothy milk.

items.name: Shakshuka
items.description: A flavorful dish of poached eggs in a rich and spicy tomato sauce with peppers, onions, and aromatic spices. Served with a side of fresh bread for dipping.

items.name: Hummus Pita
items.description: Creamy, smooth hummus served with warm, fluffy pita bread. A perfect combination of flavors from chickpeas, tahini, lemon, and garlic.

items.name: Falafel Platter
items.description: Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside—these golden-brown chickpea fritters are served with a side of hummus, salad, and pita.

items.name: Iced Cappuccino
items.description: A chilled version of the classic cappuccino, with a balance of espresso, cold milk, and topped with frothy foam, served over ice.

items.name: Iced Latte
items.description: Smooth espresso mixed with cold milk and served over ice for a creamy, refreshing drink.

items.name: Iced Americano
items.description: A simple, strong coffee drink made by pouring espresso over ice and diluting it with cold water, perfect for those who love a bold taste.

items.name: Iced Caramel Latte
items.description: A chilled blend of espresso, milk, and caramel syrup, served over ice for a sweet and creamy coffee experience.

items.name: Iced Vanilla Latte
items.description: A smooth iced latte blended with the sweet and comforting flavor of vanilla.

items.name: Hazelnut Frappé
items.description: A creamy, blended iced coffee infused with the sweet and nutty flavor of hazelnut, topped with whipped cream for an indulgent treat.

items.name: Café Frappé
items.description: A classic iced coffee blended to perfection, offering a smooth, rich taste of coffee with a refreshing chill, topped with whipped cream.

items.name: Irish Frappé
items.description: A rich, blended iced coffee with the smooth flavor of Irish cream (non-alcoholic), offering a perfect balance of sweetness and coffee kick.

items.name: Caramel Frappé
items.description: A luscious blend of cold coffee, caramel syrup, and milk, topped with whipped cream and drizzled with caramel sauce for an extra sweet finish.

items.name: Vanilla Frappé
items.description: A smooth and creamy frappé blended with vanilla flavor, topped with whipped cream for a classic indulgence.

items.name: Watermelon Mojito
items.description: A refreshing blend of fresh watermelon juice, mint leaves, lime, and a splash of soda, making it a perfect summer cooler.

items.name: Blue Lagoon Mojito
items.description: A vibrant, blue mojito featuring the zesty flavors of lime and mint, with a twist of blue curaçao (non-alcoholic) for a tropical escape.

items.name: Green Gin Cooler
items.description: A crisp and refreshing gin-based cooler mixed with mint, lime, and cucumber, topped with soda for a light, herbaceous taste.

items.name: Peach Mojito
items.description: A fruity twist on the classic mojito, featuring sweet peach syrup, fresh mint, lime, and soda for a light and fizzy drink.

items.name: Mint Mojito
items.description: A refreshing mojito made with mint, lime, sugar, and soda water, perfect for a cooling experience.

items.name: Peach Iced Tea
items.description: A sweet, fruity iced tea infused with the flavor of ripe peaches, offering a refreshing and light summer cooler.

items.name: Lemon Iced Tea
items.description: A classic, chilled tea with a hint of lemon for a perfectly refreshing drink on a warm day.

items.name: Lemonade
items.description: A zesty and tangy homemade lemonade made with freshly squeezed lemons, sugar, and chilled water.

items.name: Mint Lemonade
items.description: A refreshing twist on the classic lemonade, with a burst of fresh mint and lime, offering a cool and tangy experience.

items.name: KitKat Shake
items.description: A rich and creamy shake blended with crunchy KitKat bars, topped with whipped cream and chocolate drizzle for an indulgent treat.

items.name: Oreo Shake
items.description: A delicious shake made with Oreo cookies, milk, and ice cream, topped with whipped cream and cookie crumbs.

items.name: Vanilla Shake
items.description: A classic, creamy vanilla shake made with rich vanilla ice cream and milk, perfect for a smooth and refreshing experience.

items.name: Strawberry Shake
items.description: A creamy strawberry shake made with fresh strawberries and ice cream, topped with whipped cream.

items.name: Chocolate Shake
items.description: A decadent shake made with creamy chocolate ice cream, topped with whipped cream and drizzled with chocolate syrup.
